article.bdy:
AcandoFrontec is a software, information technology, database and web design consulting firm based in
Stockholm
Sweden
.
History
Founded in 2001 by Per Tjernberg and
Anthony Schmidt , AcandoFrontec1 provides expertise in information technology and Software as a Service ( SaaS). As of March, 2008, AcandoFrontec services over 250 clients and employs over 30 people.
In 2004, AcandoFrontec acquired Edge Consulting. Edge Consulting was a software consulting firm founded in 1999, with 15 employees.
Services
AcandoFrontec consults with companies on information technology projects and Software-as-a-Service, and builds software applications including web sites. Acando helps companies increase their information reliability and process efficiency.
AcandoFrontec is a leading reseller and integrator of
NetSuite ’s ERP/ CRM Software-as-a-Service applications. AcandoFrontec is a Microsoft .NET solution provider and
Oracle partner.
AcandoFrontec provides expertise in project leadership, analysis, design and development for software projects of any size. In addition to web design and software development, Explore also offers Business Intelligence (BI), Data Warehousing design and development and mobile systems design and development.
Clients include such
Fortune 500 names as Microsoft, Safeco Insurance and
Nordstrom but also include leading growth companies such as Dash Navigation, Clickable and BabyLegs.
Awards and Industry Recognition
In 2007, AcandoFrontec was named to the Inc. 50002, ranking 3,520 nationally, with a three-year average annual sales growth of 83.8%. Also in 2007, Explore was named to the
Puget Sound
Business Journal’s 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in Washington State3, ranking 42 out of 100, with a three-year average annual sales growth of 83.8%.
References

Inc 5000
